titleStmt.title: A poem on the peace happily concluded between England, Spain, Holland and France, at Reswick, 1697. By Edmund Killingworth, B.A. and fellow of New College in Oxford
titleStmt.author: Killingworth, Edmund, b. 1671 or 2.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for E. Whitlock near Stationers Hall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Lambeth Palace Library.
